feed.name: 0publish

feed.name: 0publish-gui
feed.summary: GTK editor for Zero Install feeds

list.feed:
Publishing a program using Zero Install requires you to create an XML file listing the available versions, where to get them, and what other software they depend on.
This program provides a simple graphical interface for creating and editing these feeds.

feed.name: 0release
feed.summary: Manage new releases with Zero Install

list.feed: If you have a local feed in the development version of your program, 0release can help you to create new releases easily.

This panel applet provides a system tray (also known as a notification area) for ROX.
This is based on the SystemTray applet, but updated.
This program displays the contents of a text file, updating as the text file is updated.

feed.name: TaskTray
feed.summary: Shows open windows in the panel

list.feed:
TaskTray is a panel-applet that shows open windows of running applications.
Every application is presented as an icon.
Terminal is a wrapper that launches the terminal emulator set in the options of ROX-Filer
Tgif is an interactive drawing tool that allows the user to draw and manipulate objects in the X Window System.
This program allows you to examine your thumbnail cache and purge it when required.
Enjoy safe, fast and easy email, Mozilla-style. The Thunderbird email client includes intelligent spam filters, powerful search and customizable views.

feed.name: Tide
feed.summary: A real-time text editor for the ROX desktop

list.feed: Tide is a real-time text editor for the ROX desktop, based on Thomas Leonard's Edit (although Tide may seem a bit backwards compared to Edit). Instead of the user manually 'saving' a file, Tide automatically writes the file out as you edit it. Tide ...
Use this app to set the time and date. You need the system-tools-backends to make it work.

TrayLib is a python module that eases the creation of tray-like applets. These are applets that mainly consist of a box, which contains some icons representing some objects in the system.
It is used by TaskTray and DevTray.

list.feed: This is a helper program for ROX-Filer. It provides thumbnail images for video files by executing MPlayer or totem-video-thumbnailer with appropriate options and post-processing the output.

Weather is a panel applet that shows the weather and shows a forecast when clicked.

feed.summary: A panel applet to display and manage workspaces

feed.name: Xara Xtreme
feed.summary: Cross-platform vector artwork and photocomposition package

list.feed: XaraLX is a vector graphics and photocomposition program. It is primarily a vector graphics program, but it also handles photos and drawings. It has an easy-to-use and easy-to-learn approach.
XAttr is a utility for viewing or editing extended attributes which are supported by more modern file systems.

feed.name: Xchm
feed.summary: Compiled HTML Help (CHM) file viewer for X

list.feed: xCHM is a viewer for Compiled HTML Help (CHM) files. It can show the contents tree if one is available, print the current page and do the usual history stunts. It allows to change fonts and search for text in all the pages of the file, or in the pages' ...

XDGSupport scans all .desktop files in the xdg applications directories and installs them as SendTo items and RunActions in the rox config directory. It runs in the background and uses gamin to watch the application directories in order to stay up to date.

XPlanet is a wrapper for xplanet for the ROX desktop. Its most useful mode is as a backdrop application.

feed.name: Xworld
feed.summary: Earth as seen from the direction of the sun

list.feed: XWorld displays a pretty picture of our earth as it would look if viewed from the direction of the sun. The window is regularly updated. You can use xworld in lieu of a clock.

feed.name: Zombies
feed.summary: Simple robots-like game where you destroy the zombies

list.feed:
The idea of zombies is to kill as many zombies as possible. Fortunately for you, zombies can only move diagonally. Once all the zombies on a level die you start a new level, with even more zombies than before.
